This class implements a group of Figs.

· hitFig

Summary  |  Top 
   public Fig hitFig(Rectangle r)

Retrieve the top-most Fig containing the given point, or null. Needs-More-Work: just do a linear search. Later, optimize this routine using Quad Trees (or other) techniques.
